allow: Bash(# Check for more ADF output directories ls /glade/derecho/scratch/hannay/ADF/)

Bash(PYTHON=/glade/u/apps/opt/conda/envs/npl/bin/python bash -c '
set -e

echo ""===================================""
echo ""CESM Status Board - GitHub Pages Deploy""
echo ""===================================""

# We already did full collection + export, skip the incremental update step
# Go straight to deploy

echo """"
echo ""Step 1: Data already collected and exported. Proceeding to deploy...""

# Check if gh-pages branch exists
if git show-ref --quiet refs/heads/gh-pages; then
    echo """"
    echo ""Step 2: Deploying to existing gh-pages branch...""

    # Stash any changes
    git stash push -m ""Pre-deploy stash"" || true

    # Switch to gh-pages
    git checkout gh-pages

    # Copy updated web files \(HTML, CSS, JS\) from main
    echo ""Updating web files from main branch...""
    git checkout main -- web/

    cp -r web/css web/js web/index.html .

    # Copy updated data files
    mkdir -p data
    cp web/data/*.json data/

    # Commit changes
    git add css/ js/ index.html data/
    git commit -m ""Update site - $\(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'\)"" || echo ""No changes to commit""

    # Push to remote
    echo """"
    echo ""Step 3: Pushing to GitHub...""
    git push origin gh-pages

    # Return to main branch
    git checkout main

    # Restore stashed changes if any
    git stash pop || true

else
    echo ""gh-pages branch not found locally â€” something unexpected, aborting""
    exit 1
fi

echo """"
echo ""===================================""
echo ""Deployment Complete!""
echo ""===================================""
echo """"
echo ""Your site should be available at:""
echo ""https://brianpm.github.io/cesm_dev_statboard/""
')
Bash(git -C /tmp/gh-pages-worktree add data/ css/ js/ index.html)
Bash(git -C /tmp/gh-pages-worktree commit -m "Update site - 257 cases, 140 with diagnostics, 16861 statistics \(2026-02-17\)")
